meanings.sent1: The kind gesture was thankworthier than I could express.
meanings.sent2: She is the most thankworthier person I know.
meanings.sent3: His dog's loyalty is truly thankworthier than any treasure.
meanings.sent4: The sun's warmth on a cold day is thankworthier than any material possession.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's patience and guidance are truly thankworthier than words can convey.
